## RedemptionDetails.actualDCHFAmount property

Amount of DCHF that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualDCHFAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedDCHFAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
